titles.title: O For A Closer Walk With God (William Cowper)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O for a closer walk with God, A calm and heavenly frame, A light to shine upon the road That leads me to the Lamb!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where is the blessedness I knew, When first I saw the Lord? Where is the soul refreshing view Of Jesus and His Word?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What peaceful hours I once enjoyed! How sweet their memory still! But they have left an aching void The world can never fill.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Return, O holy Dove, return, Sweet messanger of rest! I hate the sins that made Thee mourn, And drove Thee from my breast.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The dearest idol I have known, What eâ€™er that idol be, Help me to tear it from Thy throne, And worship only Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
